short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Try the AI Assistant for Creating Confluence Pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Confluence Assistant is a powerful tool designed to help you quickly create, edit, and enhance Confluence pages using the power of AI. With this extension, you can easily generate well-structured Confluence pages by simply providing a prompt. The assistant helps you structure your content with headings, bullet points, tables, code blocks, and more, ensuring your Confluence pages are both informative and visually appealing.
